basics.name: Madhura Pawar
basics.label: Final Year Student, Masters in AI, UvA

work.name: KlearStack - AI driven OCR and Intelligent Data Extraction Software
highlights: Developed back-end module for extracting information from handwritten mandate forms to validate their authenticity.
Implemented heuristic generalized algorithms for template-less data extraction from invoices.
Set up auto-language detection and translation pipeline to provide multi-lingual invoice support.

work.name: Credit Suisse
highlights: Predictive Modeling of Service Requests: Built a web-app predicting the closing date of incoming service requests. Analysed and trained a variety of predictive models post data cleaning and preprocessing.  Developed REST APIs in Flask Python for the web-app.

Service & Test Maturity Assessment Application: Developed the client-side module using ReactJS, Java Spring Boot and Flask Python & Impala for database querying where a service owner assesses his service based on pre-defined metrics.

work.name: BMC Software
highlights: Designed and built an application which initiates Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery in case of organisational failure due to a natural disaster.

volunteer.name: National Service Scheme
volunteer.position: National Service Scheme: Treasurer, Content Writer & Volunteer
highlights: Managed funding & expenditure of the NSS activities; Raised funds towards Kerala flood rehabilitation.
Ideated and led the Awareness drive on Malaria & Dengue in slums near Parvati hill, Pune.
Organised an event thanking police officers and distributed 150 letters for ensuring citizen safety.
Started an online campaign ‘Deed of the Week’ bringing to light the stories of people doing kind acts.

education.institution: University of Amsterdam, Amsterdam, The Netherlands
courses: Fairness, Accountability, Confidentiality and Transparency in AI

education.institution: Pune Institute of Computer Technology, Pune, India

awards.title: Pune University Gold Medalist
awards.summary: Overall University Rank 1 in Computer Engg. across 90 colleges of Pune University. Awarded Dr.D.Y. Patil, G.H. Raisoni and C.A.V. Bahule Gold Medals and Catono P. Ramas Prize for securing the highest marks in Computer Engineering.

awards.title: Recipient of the BMC Software Scholarship
awards.summary: Received for obtaining Institute Rank 1 in the 2nd year of Computer Engg. Deptt

awards.title: Recipient of Late Shri. Gendalal Chordia Scholarship
awards.summary: Received for outstanding performance in Engg. Mathematics in the 2nd year of Computer Engg. Deptt
